title: What is wrong with my pixel XL since sound doesn't work without earphones, only alarms and call ring
content: I restarted the phone the first time and it seemed to be fixed, then suddenly out of nothing it happened again and sound didn't work, I tried using earphones (apple earphones) and it works, but when I plug em out I can't hear anything, i rebooted to safe mode plenty of times but not even YouTube videos can be heard without earphones, this pixel has only 2 months of use
